author: Special Correspondent
text:
Awareness programmes on leprosy eradication will be held in various parts of the district for a fortnight from January 30 to February 13, said S. Ganesh, District Collector.

Inaugurating a training programme on World Leprosy Eradication Day here on Saturday, he said screening camps, cultural events, and training sessions would be held to sensitise the elected representatives to fight against the disease.

The Collector emphasised the need for eliminating the superstitions and social stigma surrounding the disease.

“More than leprosy, it is the social stigma which should be first addressed,” he said explaining the immediate care and attention needed for the persons afflicted with the symptoms of the disease.
title: Awareness drive on leprosy eradication launched
